column1: The Pit Room////Apparently the place to eat when you're in town and it did not disappoint. I was not a fan of the chewy too red for me brisket but it was not a deal breaker. The pulled pork and sausage was pretty flavorful. The line was out the door and it was well worth it. Great atmosphere
column2: wonderful crew of polite people. Side dishes were packed with flavor and I highly recommend those in the picture as well as the corn. $70 for two combos
column3: a 3 piece ribs and two sodas.
